sectionDesc: Develop and programmatically automate security in planning, development, assessment, and operational activities

items.name:
During PLANNING,
use MITRE SAF to:
bullets: Identify applicable security and privacy requirements
Assess development best practices guidance
Identify MITRE SAF tools to support development, assessment, & operations security processes

items.name:
During DEVELOPMENT,
use MITRE SAF to:
bullets: Implement relevant security hardening scripts
Validate security status and aggregate security testing data at each build
Drill-down in visualization tools to identify security defect root cause and mitigations
Set security testing results thresholds
Assess development best practices guidance
Store or export “evidence” for assessors

items.name:
During ASSESSMENT,
use MITRE SAF to:
bullets: Aggregate all security control assessment data
Visualize security status to prioritize assessment activities
Run validation checks on prioritized areas
Drill-down in visualization tools to identify root cause and inform risk assessment

items.name:
During OPERATIONS,
use MITRE SAF to:
bullets: Monitor security posture through validation checks
Aggregate normalized security testing content to enable data visualization, drill-down, and root cause analysis
Assign remediation actions for identified security risks

sectionDesc: Develop a toolchain to support the above areas of What and How for secure development.
NOTE: The new saf cli tool replicates the functions of InSpec_Tools and Heimdall_Tools. The older tools have been deprecated.

items.name: saf cli
items.desc: Consolidates SAF automation goals into a convenient command-line tool, including commands to:
bullets: Generate InSpec security validation code
Set and validate threshold checks within a pipeline
Convert security tool test data to and from our standard Heimdall Data Format (HDF)
Automate Heimdall setup and deployment

items.name: Heimdall Lite
items.desc: A lightweight version of Heimdall for simple use cases

items.name: Heimdall Server
items.desc: The complete Heimdall application - store results, coordinate across the development team, and more

items.name: Heimdall Tools GitHub Action
items.desc: Add Heimdall Tools to your GitHub Actions workflow

items.name: HDF Splunk Plugin
items.desc: Splunk plugin to upload Inspec output, Heimdall Tools output, and any other HDF format files to Splunk, for consumption by Heimdall Lite

items.name: InSpec Tools GitHub Action
items.desc: Add InSpec Tools to your GitHub Actions workflow

items.name: InSpec Delta
items.desc: Gem aiming to make the maintenance of InSpec profiles representing security benchmarks less of a maintenance burden by providing helpful command line tools

items.name: Serverless InSpec (AWS)
items.desc: Lambda function that allows execution of InSpec profiles in a serverless fashion

items.name: Serverless Heimdall Pusher (AWS)
items.desc: Lambda function that pushes HDF results stored in an s3 bucket to Heimdall Server

items.name: emasser cli
items.desc: CLI tool providing utilities for the Enterprise Mission Assurance Support Service (eMASS) via its REST API

items.name: eMASS Checklist Updater
items.desc: Tool to translate findings from older to newer versions of an eMASS Checklist

items.name: Vulcan (alpha)
items.desc: Application for streamlining InSpec profile and overlay development using the Security Requirements Guide (SRG)
